en.label: Content can be targeted for experience purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes

en.label: Content can be targeted for functional purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for functional purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for functional purposes

en.label: Content can be targeted for experience purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes

en.label: Content can be targeted for marketing purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for marketing purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for marketing purposes

en.label: Display username to non-squad users
en.userNotice: Determines if your username can be shown to non-squad users
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child''s username can be shown to non-squad users

en.label: Can see usernames of players from other squads
en.userNotice: Determines if you can see usernames of players from other squads
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can see usernames of players from other squads

en.label: Allow Create Experiences
en.userNotice: Determines whether the account can access general-purpose Create experiences in Fortnite (e.g. Creative Create)

ja.label: Voice chat
ja.userNotice: Determines with whom you can use the voice chat feature
You can voice chat only with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list.
You can voice chat with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list, and those on their team.
You can voice chat with any player.

ja.label: Voice chat
ja.userNotice: Determines with whom you can use the text chat feature
You cannot use text chat with anybody
You can use text chat with friends only
You can use text chat with friends and teammates
You can use text chat with everybody

en.label: Enhanced voice chat recording
en.parentNotice: Determines enhanced voice chat recording setting

en.label: Enhanced text chat recording
en.parentNotice: Determines enhanced text chat recording setting

en.label: Enhanced voice chat recording
en.parentNotice: Determines enhanced voice chat recording setting

en.label: ON
en.parentNotice: When Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting is turned ON, it is available in all voice chats.

en.label: PREFER OFF
en.parentNotice: When Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting is turned to PREFER OFF, it is disabled when all players in the party channel have set enhanced voice reporting to PREFER OFF.

en.label: PREFER OFF & AUTOMUTE
en.parentNotice: Same behaviour as PREFER OFF. Additionally, you will be auto-muted if reporting is available in your voice chat due to the preferences of other players. Note that enhanced voice chat reporting is always enabled, regardless of your settings, in game chat, proximity chat, looking for party chat, or when a party includes at least one player who has Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting turned ON. You will be notified in-game if the status of reporting changes. Only players aged 18 and older can change this setting to PREFER OFF or PREFER OFF & AUTO MUTE.

en.label: Filter out Personally Identifiable Information in Epic text chat
en.userNotice: Personally Identifiable Information in text chat will be filtered and replaced with heart symbols
en.parentNotice: On: Personally Identifiable Information in text chat will be filtered and replaced with heart symbols.

en.label: Push Friend Invite Notifications
en.userNotice: Receive push notifications for Friend Invites from Epic Games apps on your mobile device.
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can receive push notifications for Friend Invites from Epic Games apps on mobile devices.

en.label: Push Party Invite Notifications
en.userNotice: Receive push notifications for Party Invites from Epic Games apps on your mobile device.
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can receive push notifications for Party Invites from Epic Games apps on mobile devices.

en.label: Push Marketing Notifications
en.userNotice: Receive push notifications for Marketing from Epic Games apps on your mobile device.
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can receive push notifications for Marketing from Epic Games apps on mobile devices.
